body:
Hi Tasos!



I checked my task manager but E+ does not seem to run in the background. In fact the 'runIt_' boolean comes to True as soon as I hit it. The screen blinks for a few times and that's it. The 'Re-Run IDF' components shows .csv files being generated at their respective locations but are not actually getting generated. i am not sure why is this happening.

Regards,

Ram
